content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price I have in mind is €1,500. Remember, I only respond with the agreed price or if I want to end the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I expect for this unfurnished apartment in the city center. 
TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
